entry.title: Coq typeclass resolution is Turing-complete
entry.summary: Proof by construction that the typeclass resolver in Coq can perform arbitrary computation while searching for instances.

entry.title: foldhash vs rustc-hash
entry.summary: Comparison of the new hashing algorithms in foldhash, used by hashbrown as of version 0.15, and rustc-hash, both written by Orson Peters using folded multiplies.
